comments.guild_id: Default ID for your guild (discord server). 0 is an invalid ID.
comments.log_file_cnt: Number of logfiles to cycle through.  e.g. you could have 5 files each 32 MB.
comments.max_bytes: Maximum size of a logfile, measured in Bytes.
comments.test_guild_id: Default ID for your test/sandbox guild (discord server). 0 is an invalid ID.
